oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Your best business asset: A great team
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Taylor, Becky
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hiring
performance
team
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This session will outline strategies to use in hiring top performers, outlining expectations and monitoring best performance. When used in combination, these can lead the way to creating a strengths based team that contributes to practice success. A high functioning team creates a service model that promotes high level patient care and exceptional client service.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2020; 283-284
